column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is easily one of the best steakhouses in Chicago (also check out Benny's and Kinzie's). The last time I was here I got the Bone-in dry aged rib-eye and my wife got the petite fillet
column2: both were perfect. The sides here are also amazing
column4: creamed spinach (!!!!) and elote style corn
column5: all of them were great. This place is definitely on the pricey side but definitely recommended for a nice occasion.
